text: The Mjosund Bridge () is a cantilever bridge that crosses the Mjosundet strait between the islands of Rottøya and Ertvågsøya in the municipality of Aure in Møre og Romsdal county, Norway. Along with the Aursund Bridge, it is part of the road connection between the mainland and Ertvågsøya. Mjosund Bridge is long and opened in 1995. The Mjosund Bridge ==See also== *List of bridges in Norway *List of bridges in Norway by length *List of bridges *List of bridges by length ==References== Category:Bridges in Møre og Romsdal Category:Aure, Norway
title: Mjosund Bridge
